ideas.title: ‘ONE RULE’: Trump says he’ll sign an executive order blocking state AI laws despite bipartisan pushback
ideas.description: “I will be doing a ONE RULE Executive Order this week,” Trump posted on social media. “You can’t expect a company to get 50 Approvals every time they want to do something.”
hooks: Trump's AI Executive Order: Game Changer or Power Grab?
50 State Laws vs. One Presidential Rule
Inside Trump's Controversial AI Regulatory Playbook

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience interaction
Prepare pre-screened Q&A questions to maintain flow
Use multi-camera setup for dynamic visual engagement

visualDirection.description: High-contrast red/blue political color palette, dynamic infographic overlays, animated legal/policy icons, split-screen news footage, bold sans-serif typography with motion tracking, minimalist yet dramatic design suggesting complexity and tension

exampleOutline: Opening: Live Stream Introduction & Breaking News Context
State vs. Federal AI Regulation Breakdown
Live Q&A and Audience Interaction Segment

visualDirection.description: Modern, clean aesthetic with brand colors. Professional but approachable. Consider subtle motion graphics to add visual interest.

ideas.title: Booking.com’s agent strategy: Disciplined, modular and already delivering 2× accuracy
ideas.description:
When many enterprises weren’t even thinking about agentic behaviors or infrastructures, Booking.com had already “stumbled” into them with its homegrown conversational recommendation system. 

This early experimentation has allowed the company to take a step back and avoid getting swept up in the frantic AI agent hype. Instead, it is taking a disciplined, layered, modular approach to model development: small, travel-specific models for cheap, fast inference; larger large language models (LLMs) fo
hooks: How Booking.com quietly revolutionized AI travel recommendations
The secret AI strategy beating Silicon Valley's hype
Travel AI: A masterclass in disciplined innovation

tips: Use archival travel footage as B-roll to illustrate Booking.com's journey
Include motion graphics showing technical architecture of recommendation system
Create chapter markers highlighting key technical insights

visualDirection.description: Cool, tech-forward documentary aesthetic with deep blue and slate gray color palette. Infographic-style technical visualizations. Clean sans-serif typography with subtle technical wireframe overlays. Dynamic camera movements simulating data flow. Minimal but sophisticated motion design emphasizing information hierarchy.

exampleOutline: Opening: Cinematic travel scene revealing AI's transformative potential
Booking.com's Modular AI Strategy: Technical Deep Dive
Future of Travel Tech: Closing Vision and Call to Action

ideas.title: ChatGPT agent mode: The “little helper” that transformed recruiting, crafted user personas, and solved parking nightmares | Michal Peled (Honeybook)
ideas.description: Watch now | 🎙️ Michal Peled on using ChatGPT agent mode to automate LinkedIn recruiting, creating AI personas from customer research, and building practical AI tools that solve real business problems
hooks: ChatGPT Agent Mode: 3 Business Hacks in 10 Minutes
Transform Recruiting with AI's Secret Weapon
One ChatGPT Trick That Solves Everything

tips: Use screen recording to demonstrate each agent mode step
Include live demonstrations of actual prompts and outputs
Create chapter markers for each specific use case

visualDirection.description: High-contrast tech-inspired color palette with electric blue and charcoal gray. Dynamic split-screen compositions showing prompt inputs and AI outputs. Modern sans-serif typography with sharp, clean lines. Animated transition graphics between use cases. Subtle glitch/tech overlay effects to emphasize AI innovation.

exampleOutline: Section 1: What is ChatGPT Agent Mode? (Hook)

ideas.title: Hinge’s new AI feature helps daters move beyond boring small talk

hooks: AI is Transforming Dating: Hinge's Radical New Approach
Beyond Small Talk: How AI Reimagines Connection
The End of Awkward First Messages

tips: Use cinematic b-roll of real dating scenarios
Include interview-style testimonials from actual Hinge users

visualDirection.description: Modern, sleek documentary aesthetic with warm color palette (soft blues, muted oranges). Utilize split-screen techniques, data visualization overlays. Typography should feel contemporary and approachable - sans-serif, clean lines. Incorporate subtle AI-inspired graphic elements suggesting connection and technology. Motion should feel fluid and intelligent, with smooth transitions highlighting human-AI interaction.

exampleOutline: Opening: Emotional Personal Story of Dating Struggle
Tech Exploration: How Hinge's AI Actually Works
Future Vision: AI and Human Connection
